scope.description: Convention App Client is a full-stack project for managing and attending conventions, featuring a React Native/Expo frontend and a Node.js/Express/MongoDB backend. It supports user authentication, event management, announcements, user profiles, and ticketing/check-in.

key_files: constants/ - App-wide constants (e.g., Colors, API URLs)
api/ - API client and endpoint wrappers
src/models/ - Mongoose models (User, Event, Ticket, Announcement)
src/routes/ - Express route handlers (auth, events, announcements, profile, tickets)

assets/.purpose: Static assets (images, fonts, icons) for Expo/React Native

docs/.purpose: Documentation (API, guides, deployment, troubleshooting, OpenAPI spec)

scripts/.purpose: Utility scripts for project setup and maintenance

.github/.purpose: GitHub Actions workflows for CI/CD, issue templates

file_purpose.src/app/: App entry, routing, and screens for the Expo frontend.
file_purpose.src/components/: Reusable UI components (ThemedText, ThemedView, Collapsible, etc).
file_purpose.src/constants/: Color schemes, API URLs, and other constants.
file_purpose.src/hooks/: Custom React hooks for theme, color scheme, etc.
file_purpose.src/api/: API client setup and endpoint wrappers.
file_purpose.backend/server.js: Express server setup and route mounting.
file_purpose.backend/src/models/: Mongoose schemas for User, Event, Ticket, Announcement.
file_purpose.backend/src/routes/: Express route handlers for API endpoints.
file_purpose.Dockerfile: Build instructions for frontend Docker image.
file_purpose.backend/Dockerfile: Build instructions for backend Docker image.
file_purpose.docker-compose.yml: Orchestrates frontend, backend, and MongoDB containers.
file_purpose..github/workflows/: CI/CD pipelines for build, test, deploy.
file_purpose.README.md: Project overview, setup, usage, and contribution guide.

relationships.frontend-backend: Frontend communicates with backend via REST API (API_URL in env/app.json).
relationships.backend-mongo: Backend uses Mongoose to connect to MongoDB.
relationships.docker-compose: Runs frontend, backend, and MongoDB together for local development.
relationships.CI/CD: GitHub Actions run tests and builds on push/pull_request.
relationships.Copilot: Copilot config and prompts guide AI code suggestions.
